name: simplebtc
description: High-level Bitcoin library and command line tool

scripts.build: npx babel simplebtc.js -o dist/simplebtc.js && webpack --mode none --output-library-target var --output-library simplebtc dist/simplebtc.js -o dist/simplebtc.global.js && terser dist/simplebtc.js -cmo dist/simplebtc.js && terser dist/simplebtc.global.js -cmo dist/simplebtc.global.js
scripts.setUpBashCompletion: mkdir -p /etc/bash_completion.d/ > /dev/null 2>&1 ; bash -c "echo 'complete -W \"address balance history stream send\" simplebtc' > /etc/bash_completion.d/simplebtc" > /dev/null 2>&1 ; exit 0

author: Ryan Lester <hacker@linux.com> (https://github.com/buu700)
